Package pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CellRepresentation.EndHandler  
    GridPanelEventHandler
    Interface defining all the methods that need to be implemented in order to handle mouse events in a GridPanel.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CellRepresentation
    Graphically represents a cell in a GridPanel
    GridPanel
    Represents a grid of a configurable number of lines and columns, where each cell can contain a visual representation.
    ImageCellRepresentation
    Abstract class that draws an image (of a cell) in a GridPanel
    MediaLoader  
    MultipleImageCellRepresentation
    Represents a cell by drawing a sequence of images with a defined delay between each other.
    OverlayCellRepresentation
    Represents a cell by overlaying two other CellRepresentations on top of each other
    SingleImageCellRepresentation
    Draws a single image as a Cell Representation
    SingleImageWithStateCellRepresentation
    Draws a single image as a Cell Representation, allowing it to be enabled or disabled.
    SlideCellRepresentation  
    TremblingCellRepresentation
    Represents a cell by showing an original CellRepresentation and changing its position slightly to emulate "shaking"
